resource.template: insert into sys_msg_tpl (id_, name_, key_, type_key_, is_default_,subject_, plain_, html_, create_by_, create_org_id_) VALUES ('${ID_}', '${NAME_}', '${KEY_}', '${TYPE_KEY_}', '${IS_DEFAULT_}','${SUBJECT_}', '${PLAIN_}', '${HTML_}', '${CREATE_BY_}', '${CREATE_ORG_ID_}');

insert into sys_type_group (id_, group_key_, name_, flag_, sn_,type_, create_by_, create_org_id_) VALUES ('${ID_}', '${GROUP_KEY_}', '${NAME_}', '${FLAG_}', '${SN_}','${TYPE_}', '${CREATE_BY_}', '${CREATE_ORG_ID_}');

insert into custom_dialog (id_, name_, alias_, style_, obj_name_,need_page_, page_size_, displayfield_, conditionfield_, resultfield_,sortfield_,dsalias_,is_table_,diy_sql_,sql_build_type_,width_,height_,select_num_,system_) VALUES ('${ID_}', '${NAME_}', '${ALIAS_}', '${STYLE_}', '${OBJ_NAME_}','${NEED_PAGE_}', '${PAGE_SIZE_}', '${DISPLAYFIELD_}', '${CONDITIONFIELD_}', '${RESULTFIELD_}','${SORTFIELD_}','${DSALIAS_}','${IS_TABLE_}','${DIY_SQL_}','${SQL_BUILD_TYPE_}','${WIDTH_}','${HEIGHT_}','${SELECT_NUM_}','${SYSTEM_}');

insert into bpm_selector_def (id_, name_, alias_, group_field_, buttons_, is_custom_, flag_, method_, conf_key_) VALUES ('${ID_}', '${NAME_}', '${ALIAS_}', '${GROUP_FIELD_}', '${BUTTONS_}','${IS_CUSTOM_}', '${FLAG_}', '${METHOD_}', '${CONF_KEY_}');
